text: Libra is an astrological sign, related to the constellation Libra, in the Southern Hemisphere near Scorpius and Virgo. In the tropical zodiac, the Sun meets Libra from September 23 to October 23, and in the sidereal zodiac, it ends on November 15. Libra, (The Scales of Balance), is the only symbol of the zodiac that is inanimate (it is not represented by an animal or person). The opposite sign to Libra is Aries. The corresponding month in the Babylonian calendar is Ti≈°ritum, made for Shamash (the Sun). ==Symbol== Libra's symbol, like the scales, is the only symbol in the zodiac that is not represented by an animal or person. == Mythology == In mythology a Libra is related to the Greek Goddess of love, Aphrodite, the Greek mythology Libra is also related to the Greco-Roman goddess Aphrodite/Venus and sometimes also the goddesses Eris/Discordia & Harmonia/Concordia,Dike, Themis, Hera/Juno, Ishtar, Freyja, Persephone, Frigg and Forsetti the god Xolotl. == Traditional relationships with Libra == *Birthstone: Opal, Tourmaline, Philosopher *Colours: Pink, Pale Green, Blue, Lavender *Gemstones: Lapis, Tourmaline, Aventurine *Metal: Steel, Gold, Platinum == Libra People == *Park Jimin - Singer *Kate Winslet - English Actress *James Earl Carter - thirty-ninth president of the United States of America *Al Capp - cartoonist *Michael Douglas - actor, movie producer *Mahatma Gandhi - activist, pacifist, philosopher *Bob Geldof - musician, humanitarian *Julio Iglesias - singer *Margot Kidder - actress *Groucho Marx - comedian, filmmaker *Roger Moore - actor *Eleanor Roosevelt - politician *Bashar Rahal - actor,producer *Susan Sarandon - actress *Bobby Seale - activist *Dmitri Shostakovich - composer *Desmond Tutu - cleric, activist *Sting - musician *Captain Row Robinson - New Zealand Maori Chief and Fisherman *Truman Capote - Novelist, Playwright, Story Writer *Crystal Sinclair *Dustin Dukes * Ne-Yo - Musician * Zac Efron - Actor * Marina Diamandis - Singer/Songwriter *Will Smith - Actor *Eminem - Rapper *Park Jimin- South Korean singer *Cardi B-Rapper *Lil Wayne-Rapper *Kim Kardashian- socialite *Usher-R&B;
